text: Anante Juda naga'mo'za nezmafu Simioni nagakura amanage hu'za zmasami'naze, eta eme taza hinketa tagri'ma hurante'nea mopafima mani'naza Kenani vahera hara ome huta zamaheteta, ete tamagrira tamaza hanunketa tamagri mopafima mani'naza vahera hara huta zamahegahaze. E'inage hazageno Simioni naga'mo'za Juda naga'ene vu'naze.
